Shorts in soft cotton denim with broderie anglaise. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, side and back pockets, and scalloped hems.

Popover running jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with reflective details, a hood and a zip at the top with a chin guard. Partially loose yoke at the back. long sleeves with ribbing and thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded, drawstring hem. Slightly longer at the back. Partly lined in mesh.

Popover jacket in close-fitting jersey with padded sections in woven fabric, a padded hood and a wind flap at the top with press-studs. Tunnel pocket at the front and long sleeves with thumbholes. Lined. Polyester filling.
